items.sentence: Tom promised not to tell anyone about what we did.
Tom promised to do everything he could to help me.
Tom drank about three times as much as Mary drank.
Tom figured that Mary would like to know the news.
This picture of Tom was taken in Boston last year.
Three beautiful ladies just walked into the lobby.
We can\'t let Tom practice piano so late at night.
You must bring your passport with you to the bank.
I can\'t thank you enough for what you did for me.
I didn\'t realize that you wanted me here at 2:30.
Tom says he\'s planning on buying a gift for Mary.
Tom says that he doesn\'t want to do that anymore.
The average weight of a male wolf is 40 kilograms.
I thought I\'d have another chance to talk to Tom.
Tom and Mary were the winners of the science fair.
Tom and Mary worked together to solve the problem.

Every person is expected to bring their own lunch.
I doubt Tom will ever forgive Mary for doing that.
I doubt that Tom will be punished for what he did.
I doubt that Tom would ever do that kind of thing.
I doubt very seriously that Tom will win the race.
I have a feeling that wasn\'t too difficult to do.
I haven\'t eaten anything for the last three days.

It would be counter-productive to do such a thing.
It would be great if you could join us for dinner.
Tom is in the next room, explaining what happened.
Tom is one of the guys that Mary is interested in.
I can\'t bear the thought of her with another man.
I can\'t figure out why nobody comes here anymore.
I can\'t say I share your enthusiasm for the idea.
I can\'t tell you how much I appreciate your help.

It\'s been a long time since I\'ve seen you smile.
Tom reluctantly gave Mary the money she asked for.

Tom just wants Mary to help him with his homework.
